facebookresearch /

      segment-anything---The repository provides code for running inference with the SegmentAnything Model (SAM), links for downloading the trained model checkpoints, and example notebooks that show how to use the model.

      rime-ice---Rime 配置：雾凇拼音 | 长期维护的简体词库

Torantulino /

      Auto-GPT---An experimental open-source attempt to make GPT-4 fully autonomous.

yoheinakajima /

      babyagi---

project-baize /

      baize-chatbot---Let ChatGPT teach your own chatbot in hours with a single GPU!

bitloops /

      ddd-hexagonal-cqrs-es-eda---Complete working example of using Domain Driven Design (DDD), Hexagonal Architecture, CQRS, Event Sourcing (ES), Event Driven Architecture (EDA), Behaviour Driven Development (BDD) using TypeScript and NestJS. Like what you see? Don't forget to star! ⭐ ^^^

ArroyoSystems /

      arroyo---Arroyo is a distributed stream processing engine written in Rust

VideoCrafter /

      VideoCrafter---A Toolkit for Text-to-Video Generation and Editing

microsoft /

      JARVIS---JARVIS, a system to connect LLMs with ML community. Paper: https://arxiv.org/pdf/2303.17580.pdf

ViperX7 /

      Alpaca-Turbo---Web UI to run alpaca model locally

imClumsyPanda /

      langchain-ChatGLM---langchain-ChatGLM, local knowledge based ChatGLM with langchain ｜ 基于本地知识的 ChatGLM

vcheckzen /

      KeepAliveE5---

dair-ai /

      ML-Papers-of-the-Week---🔥Highlighting the top ML papers every week.

slint-ui /

      slint---Slint is a toolkit to efficiently develop fluid graphical user interfaces for any display: embedded devices and desktop applications. We support multiple programming languages, such as Rust, C++, or JavaScript.

young-geng /

      EasyLM---Large language models (LLMs) made easy, EasyLM is a one stop solution for pre-training, finetuning, evaluating and serving LLMs in JAX/Flax.

corca-ai /

      EVAL---[Corca / DEV] EVAL(Elastic Versatile Agent with Langchain) will execute all your requests. Just like an eval method!

Torantulino /

      AI-Functions---AI-Powered Function Magic: Never code again with GPT models!

easychen /

      chatchan-dist---Chat酱独立部署版

EbookFoundation /

      free-programming-books---📚 Freely available programming books

SkalskiP /

      courses---This repository is a curated collection of links to various courses and resources about Artificial Intelligence (AI)

emcf /

      engshell---An English-language shell for any OS, powered by LLMs

topjohnwu /

      Magisk---The Magic Mask for Android

f /

      awesome-chatgpt-prompts---This repo includes ChatGPT prompt curation to use ChatGPT better.

c121914yu /

      FastGPT---一个快速使用chatGPT的平台。支持自定义 prompt 管理。支持构建专属知识库
